title: A Closer Look: Trump Lashes Out After Michael Cohen Raid | Sarah McBride
description:
Seth takes a closer look at one of the most extraordinary moments of Donald Trump’s presidency: when the FBI raided the offices of his personal lawyer, Michael Cohen.

Then, activist Sarah McBride explains what she wants people to understand about the transgender community, opens up about her husband's death from cancer and remembers when she met Joe Biden for the first time.

After that, Late Night producer Henry Melcher continues the conversation backstage with McBride exclusively for this podcast.

LATE NIGHT ON SOCIAL
